description: East and west loop network of the Parc Du Lac Beauchamp, a little forest haven in the middle of the Gatineau sector. A simple, fairly flat hike in a very well maintained set of trails.The west loop is deep under the canopy during summer and goes through a hardwood section of forest. The east loop goes on top af a flat and rocky area. Both loops are equally close to the Lake in the middle of the park and its beach and recreation area.
directions: The east loop is reachable from parking number 1. The west loop can be reach via parking 1, 2 and 3.
title: Sentiers du parc du lac Beauchamp - trails
